title: Jungle Platformer Music Pack
description: Feel the primal pulse of the untamed jungle with this 29 (and growing) captivating music collection. Each song is carefully crafted to transport players to a world where adventure awaits at every turn.
longDescription:
Tired of sounding like a movie when you're making a game? Or boring loops? How about music that seems like it's going nowhere?


Instead...

Dive into the wild, untamed beauty of the jungle with this Jungle Themed Music Pack inspired by the Donkey Kong series, and let the power of music immerse your players in an unforgettable adventure. Get ready to explore, leap, and conquer with these mesmerizing melodies, available now on our game asset marketplace.


Introduction:

https://youtu.be/HohSryHoSnY


Preview all the music in this pack!:

https://soundcloud.com/nygmahex/sets/jungle-adventure-music-pack-full-previews
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 29 different jungle themed songs inspired by the Donkey Kong series.
  • Always royalty free.
  • All updates to the pack are free. Price will increase with the adding of new tracks, but updates are free if you already own it.
  • Â The music is in different keys, tempos and moods.

Number of Audio Wavs: 29

Number of Audio Cues: 29

Sample rate / bit rate: 48,000Hz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 1 hr 30 mins 30 secs

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Important/Additional Notes: If you like my work feel free to contact me with your inquiries for exclusive royalty free music!
